name: Espress Labs
tagline: We are a full-service agency based out of Toronto,
description:
Founded in 2003 as a creative studio, our primary goal is to promote modern marketing services, brand identity, web design and development to companies who are looking for something more, to companies who know that they need to be different.
Today, Espress Labs creates and interacts with brands globally.
Our diverse team collaborates efficiently across various disciplines to solve a wide range of communication challenges for our partners. Our perspective, imagination and passion are integral to our collective success.
